bomberman.core.ui
Class PauseScreen

java.lang.Object
  bomberman.core.ui.PauseScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
UIScreen, playn.core.Keyboard.Listener, playn.core.Pointer.Listener
public class PauseScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements UIScreen

The PauseScreen class takes control when the game is paused. Allows the user to restart the level, resume or exit the game.

Author:
Federico Scozzafava
